H0.text: What was the capital of West Germany from 1949 to 1990. Berlin

H1.text: What was the capital of West Germany from 1949 to 1990. Munich

H2.text: What was the capital of West Germany from 1949 to 1990. Hamburg

H3.text: What was the capital of West Germany from 1949 to 1990. Bonn

A4.text: Bonn served as the capital of West Germany from 1949 until 1990.

A5.text: the period during which Bonn was the capital of West Germany is often referred to by historians as the Bonn Republic.
